title: Hein
overview: Hein, an eleven-year-old boy, is captivated by his grandfather's unconventional job â€“ caring for a cemetery. When Hein spends his summer at the graveyard, he discovers he has supernatural powers to speak to the spirits. He is not afraid when he is befriended by the spirits to help them wrap up unfinished dealings in the world. It becomes his mission to bring guidance and messages to the spirits and their loved ones, while learning about the power of compassion and living our lives the best way we can.
